category.name: NX
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_save_precise_on_uprev
preference.preference_description: Determines whether a new assembly, created in Teamcenter Integration for NX using the Save As command, is created as precise or imprecise. For example, when the Save As command is invoked upon a precise assembly with a revision rule of Latest Working, the new assembly is precise or imprecise, depending on the setting of this preference. Valid Values: yes - Creates a precise assembly. no - Creates an imprecise assembly.
